word:
God's care for His heritage is unceasing. He suffers no affliction to come upon His children but such as is essential 
                                                                           525
for their present and eternal good. He will purify His church, even as Christ purified the temple during His ministry on earth. All that He brings upon His people in test and trial comes that they may gain deeper piety and greater strength to carry forward the triumphs of the cross.
